page.title: 09Annual events in Oakley
page.content: We school children do maypole dancing every Summer for our fete.This year we did a lot of plaiting using 16 ribbons between 8 boys and 8 girls.The music was recorded on a cassette player.In our annual dog show many kinds of dogs enter and there are prizes to be won.Second prize is a red rosette.Harvest festival is held at school and in the church.At school we make bread and act out a play.At church there is a big flower and crop display.Once a year we hold an Inter- Village quiz.An ex-Mastermind winner makes up questions and local villages supply a team of adults to answer them.Oakley wins the cup nearly every year! Each year we hold a 5 a side children's football match for surrounding village teams.
